title: Virgin America Is The Michael Jordan Of Airlines FiveThirtyEight » DataLab | FiveThirtyEight

type_specific.selection: The Chicago Bulls won 88 percent of their games during the 1995-96 regular season, going 72-10 and claiming the best record in NBA history. Impressive, right?
